attributes.action: Alert the Government they are veering down a path that nobody voted for.
attributes.additional_details: This is a simple way of alerting the Government to the true number of citizens who are deeply concerned about the current rhetoric coming out of No.10.
attributes.background: Whether you are leave or remain, by signing this petition you are purely voicing your concern that the Government is not acting in the best interest of the population. We are not behind this type of Brexit and this is NOT the will of the vast majority of the people.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
